short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A productivity system for leaders and achievers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free Chrome Extension for your PlanPlus Online task management. It will show your prioritized task list each time you open a new tab.  It allows you to edit and create new tasks that will connect with your PlanPlus Online account if you choose to upgrade to our full version.  We also introduced a feature for focus mode to allow you to select one task you'd like to focus on and see that task each time you open a new tab.
